item.title: Presidential Permit for Cameron County, Texas to Construct, Maintain, and Operate a Pedestrian Border Crossing at Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry
item.description: This presidential action authorizes Cameron County, Texas to construct, maintain, and operate a pedestrian border crossing at the Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry located on the United States-Mexico border in Brownsville, Texas. The authorization is granted by the President and is subject to the conditions set forth in the permit application and in the Presidential Permit issued for this crossing. Disclaimer: This content is AI generated. Use at your own risk. Please consult the original articles for accurate information.
